Hey everyone, I'm Festus, 

I'm knowledgeable in backend development and currently working towards fullstack development. Fast learner and eager to explore new technologies. Believer in agile software development and teamwork. Able and willing to think outside the box.

I have approached every project with responsibility and a growth mindset, staying up-to-date and learning new things day by day.
